attributes.action: donate all proceeds from his forthcoming book on British military heroism to Forces charities
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Prime Minister, Gordon Brown, indicated in an interview in the Daily Telegraph on 3rd September 2007 that he will be publishing a book with stories of British military heroism later this year. Given the ever-increasing demands on the family & charity support structure for returning wounded & able-bodied servicemen & women from the Iraq & Afghan conflicts (& the on-going underfunding from central government), this petition requests that all proceeds arising from this book should be donated to the leading forces charities.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
